description: Samuel Paty was murdered after showing cartoons of the Prophet Muhammad in class.
title: France teacher attack: Rallies held to honour beheaded Samuel Paty
title_page: France teacher attack: Rallies held to honour beheaded Samuel Paty - BBC News
maintext: No details have been given about the arrest. Four close relatives of the suspect were detained shortly after the killing. Six more people were held on Saturday, including the father of a pupil at the school and a preacher described by French media as a radical Islamist.
